snippet: "Step Up to the Plate," about the chef Michel Bras and his son, Sébastien, and "Three Stars," about the highest Michelin rating, are opening in New York this month.
abstract: "Step Up to the Plate," about the chef Michel Bras and his son, Sébastien, and "Three Stars," about the highest Michelin rating, are opening in New York this month.

headline.main: Two New Films Peer Into Celebrated Kitchens
